documents.document: Good location, good facilities not the best My sister and I stayed here over the Mardi Gras week-end. We stayed on a room and were given a room with a most stunning view over Hyde Park. The room was well furnished, well maintained and had some great extras such as micro wave and toaster. The beds were very comfortable with pillow tops on the mattresses great nights sleep! The bathroom had a huge tub and a great shower with lots of water pressure.The hotel is located next to the park, close to the major shopping centres was ideal for Mardi Gras, which runs down nearby Oxford Street. It has an amazing open air pool on the 23rd floor, surrounded by glass walls giving great views across Sydney.Service did, however, leave a great deal to be desired, The staff as naturally friendly as I have experienced elsewhere in Australia.
